Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Marine scientists across the world hunt for clues to one of the biggest environmental challenges facing our planet today - ocean acidification.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Emmanuelle boards the "Train of Life", a small railway of 163 kilometers from the high lands to the Indian Ocean. Only one train, only one engine and only one set of tracks.

Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: BECOMING A MAN...
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Among the Borana. Follow a young boy in Ethiopia as he learns his ancestral tradition of salt trading and a nomadic lifestyle.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Half Cherokee and half Scottish, John Norton leads Six Nations warriors against the invading Americans.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An east coast shipper creates a private naval fleet to seize American ships.

Clip.Title: ASIA'S MONARCHIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey to the heart of these beautiful lands to understand the relationship between the people and their monarchs.

Clip.Title: SINGAPORE 1942 END OF EMPIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This 2 Part Miniseries recounts how the British Colony of Singapore was systematically surrounded and crushed by the Japanese Empire in World War II.

Clip.Title: SINGAPORE 1942 END OF EMPIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This 2 Part Miniseries recounts how the British Colony of Singapore was systematically surrounded and crushed by the Japanese Empire in World War II.

Clip.Title: SPITFIRE SISTERS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Meet the remarkable ladies who flew for the Air Transport Auxiliary in World War II. Now in their 90's, these ladies tell us of the adventures they experienced during their incredible lives as Ferry Pilots.
